page.title: 16Trade in Chorley
page.content: In Chorley town centre there are approximatly ten fashion shops such as Bang Bang; Y.& A. seperates; Ann Christian; Rainbow boutique etc. On Eaves Lane to the East of the town centre there is only one fashion shop which is called Elizabeth Claire. There are no Hotels in the centre of Chorley; there are some on the outskirts. Unfortunatly there are no restaurants in Chorley centre; however there are a few cafees and fish and chip shops. There are two specialist record shops in Chorley; these are Malcom's musicland and Slipped Disc. Chorley is a busy market town.The large market takes place on Tuesday and a smaller market takes place on Friday and Saturday.
